Class Orientation

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.Orientation

  • public class Orientation
extends java.lang.Object
    Orientation class Used for know the actual orientation (xPlus, xMoins, yPlus, yMoins) Used for manage the orientation after turns
    Author:
    acadiou
